meta.job_title: Field Based - Senior Project Engineer, HVAC Compliance

duties_responsibilities.duty: Independently conduct testing and evaluation of products to determine compliance with applicable standards.
Provide local expertise in product categories and mentor less senior technical personnel.
Read and interpret national codes and standards for the equipment under test.
Perform preliminary design reviews both on and off-site.
Investigate technical complaints for the local office and support accreditation efforts.
Communicate project status and test results to clients, sales personnel, and management.
Actively represent the company on standards/industry committees and/or associations.
Identify and recommend engineering judgments within policy guidelines.
